character_love_rankup_text.name: Hiyori Harusaki
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: I'm Hiyori! ♪\nGonna do my very best! ♪
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Look!\nThere's someone's in trouble!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Yui Kusano
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: I've gotta become strong\nlike the rest of you!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I wanna be able to protect\nthe person I love... Um, I mean...

character_love_rankup_text.name: Rei Shijo
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: You need concentration and intuition.
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: I think it will brush up your skills a little.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Misogi Hodaka
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: What're we gonna do for fun, today?

character_love_rankup_text.name: Akari Kazemiya
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Hey...

character_love_rankup_text.name: Miyako Izumo
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Miyako wants pudding!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Yuki Nijimura
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: So, you too were drawn in\nby my beauty.
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: Don't worry.\nIt's my destiny to be seen.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Anna Hiragi
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: My true name is\nAnnerose von Stechpalm!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: You can call me "Hecate of the Gale!"

character_love_rankup_text.name: Maho Himemiya
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: Call me Maho,\nPrincess of the Maho-Maho Kingdom.
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Mr. Rabbit,\nplease let meet me my prince of destiny.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Rino Inosaki
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I've been searching\nfor my long, lost older brother\nsince time immemorial!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Hatsune Kashiwazaki
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: I'm Hatsune.\nI'm pretty strong, ya know?\nSha-shing! ☆
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Su-super powers?\nNow what could you mean by that?

character_love_rankup_text.name: Suzuna Minami
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I also happen to be a successful amateur model!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Kaori Kyan
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Tokyo is like one big amusement park!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: Okinawa is a real beauty as well!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Io Hasekura
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I feel embarrassed\nto be called "teacher."

character_love_rankup_text.name: Mimi Akane
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: Huh?\nI don't get it.\nIt's too difficult...
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Oh! Mister,\nwait up!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: Don't leave me all by myself!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Kurumi Kuribayashi
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Umm...\nUnhhh...

character_love_rankup_text.name: Yori Kazemiya
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Thank you for spending\nyour valuable time on me.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Ayane Hojo
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: Call me Ayane!\nMe and Pukichi will tag\nalong with you!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Where are you going, mister?\nHuh?
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: I wanna go over there!\nC'mon, hurry, hurry!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Suzume Amano
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I-I lack experience,\nbut I hope to be of service.
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: Something is off about this...\nOh, I'm so sorry!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Eriko Kuraishi
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: You are my soul mate...\nof destiny...

character_love_rankup_text.name: Saren Sasaki
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: I'm Saren Sasaki.\nHey, don't you think there's\ntoo much waste in the world?
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: By cutting back on waste,\nwe can live a more frugal life!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Nozomi Sakurai
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: I'm Nozomi Sakurai!\nPleasure to meet ya!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Wait...\nYou don't know who I am?
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: Ahaha!\nGuess I've still got a long way to go!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Ninon Joubert
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Konnichiwa.\nI'm Ninon Joubert!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Shinobu Kamiki
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: I am Shinobu Kamiki.\nThis skull I am holding\nis my father.
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: But it's here, right next to me...\nWhat? You don't see it?

character_love_rankup_text.name: Mahiru Noto
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: I'm fixin' to be\nthe best darn comedian out there!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Can't shake the feelin'\nthat somethin's missin'...
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: Yessiree,\nsomeone with the finest\ncomebacks to my jokes!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Yukari Ayase
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I just got a little nervous...
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: I...\nI'm gonna go have a drink!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Kyoka Hikawa
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I'm not supposed to talk to strangers.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Shiori Kashiwazaki
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Oh, the alarm.
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: I'm a little weak,\nso I've got to rest\nevery half hour.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Aoi Futaba
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I don't have a single friend...
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: My only friends are\nthe flowers that\nbloom in the wild.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Chika Misumi
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I just want to\nmake everyone happy\nwith my singing...

character_love_rankup_text.name: Makoto Aki
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Say what?\nYou're a friend of his?

character_love_rankup_text.name: Illya Ornstein
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: I am she who rules the night!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I speak to all living creatures!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Kuka Tomi
character_love_rankup_text.serif_1: Then the knight pins the helpless fairy down...
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Guehehehe... Oh!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: H-how may I be of service to you?!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Tamaki Miyasaka
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: A kitty's life for me! ♪\nWe sleep, we play,\nwe eat, and fight...

character_love_rankup_text.name: Mifuyu Ogami
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Well then, let's get started on the quest...
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3:
Hold on.
I'll be late for my
part-time job!
Catch you later!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Shizuru Hoshino
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: Leave the questing, battling,\ncleaning, and laundry to me!
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: I'll take care of everything\nfor you, Little Bro!

character_love_rankup_text.name: Misaki Tamaizumi
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: I'm a sexy, young girl,\nas you can see.
character_love_rankup_text.serif_3: You know, that super popular kid\nat school, who everyone admires! ♪

character_love_rankup_text.name: Monika Weisswind
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: How naive of you to think\nyou could lure me with sweets.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Pecorine
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: How naive of you to think\nyou could lure me with sweets.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Kokkoro
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: How naive of you to think\nyou could lure me with sweets.

character_love_rankup_text.name: Karyl
character_love_rankup_text.serif_2: How naive of you to think\nyou could lure me with sweets.
